definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: first-fruits—Le 2:14, Le 23:17, Nu 28:26 (P) 2Ki 4:42, Ne 3:12, Ne 13:31; [[בִּכֻּרִים]] Le 23:20 (P); cstr. [[בִּכּוּרֵי]] Ex 23:16, Ex 23:19 (E) Ex 34:22, Ex 34:26 (J) Nu 13:20 (E) Nu 18:13 (P) Ne 10:36, Ne 10:36, Ez Eze 44:30; sf. [[בִּכּוּרֶיךָ]] Le 2:14; —the first of grain and ftuit that ripened and was gathered and offered to God according to the ritual; [[לֶחֶם הַבִּכּוּרִים]] bread made of the new grain offered at Pentecost Le 23:20; [[יום הבכורים]] day of the first-fruits (Pentecost) Nu 28:26.
